Class LocalGameEvent

      event.LocalGameEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CharacterAttack, CharacterMove, HighlightAttackRange, HighlightMoveRange, HighlightStartTiles, TileSelectedEvent
public abstract class LocalGameEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

A game event that we can process locally, so there's no need to notify the server of it. (examples like selecting a different tile)

Author:
Nicolaas
